backend/main.mo: Main canister actor defining user roles, lessons, vocabulary, ayahs, notes, quizzes, and access-control logic with stable data structures and migration support.
backend/migration.mo: Defines stable data types and a no-op migration function returning the previous actor state unchanged.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries mapping feature IDs to affected frontend files, components, test IDs, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries for many frontend source files and public assets used in the application.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point configuring PWA meta tags, icons, manifest, and loading the root React bundle.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA manifest describing app metadata, icons, theme colors, orientation, and display mode.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing cache-first asset caching, activation cleanup, and fetch handling for offline support.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component handling authentication flow, profile setup, layout rendering, theme setup, and service worker registration.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Renders the top header with logo, user avatar, profile/settings dialogs, and logout handling using user profile data.
frontend/src/components/LessonContentAcc: Displays lesson content inside an accordion with optional rich‑text editing and save functionality.
frontend/src/components/MainLayout.tsx: Controls main app navigation and view switching between pages like lessons, quizzes, vocabulary, and whiteboard.
frontend/src/components/NoteDialog.tsx: Provides a dialog to view, create, edit, and delete notes associated with a word or verse.
frontend/src/components/ProfileDialog.ts: Offers a profile editing dialog allowing users to update their name and avatar image.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal prompting user to enter a name and submit it via registerProfile, with validation and success/error toasts.
frontend/src/components/PWAInstallDialog: Shows a popup prompting the user to install the PWA, managing the deferred install event and dismissal state.
frontend/src/components/RichTextEditor.t: Wrapper around ReactQuill with custom toolbar modules, formats, and auto-focus on mount.
frontend/src/components/SettingsDialog.t: Settings dialog allowing theme toggling and, for admins, triggering a destructive app data reset with confirmation.
frontend/src/components/WordFormWithTool: Badge component that toggles a tooltip showing a word's meaning when clicked, with click-outside handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an ICP backend actor tied to the user's identity, recreating and invalidating queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and stored identity restoration.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of react-query hooks interacting with the backend actor for profiles, lessons, words, ayahs, quizzes, and admin actions.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles plus theme variables, dark mode definitions, and custom styles for Quill editor and prose content.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/EditLessonPage.tsx: Loads a lesson by ID and provides a full UI for editing its title, content, and visibility before saving updates.
frontend/src/pages/LessonsPage.tsx: Displays all lessons with controls for viewing, editing, deleting, toggling active state, and changing visibility.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Renders a login screen allowing users to authenticate via Internet Identity.
frontend/src/pages/NewLessonPage.tsx: Creates new lessons with title, content, visibility, and detailed word and ayah management via dialogs.
frontend/src/pages/NewQuizPage.tsx: Provides a form to create a quiz by choosing a title and quiz type, then submitting it to the backend.
frontend/src/pages/NotesPage.tsx: Shows user notes with options to delete them and displays loading or empty states as needed.
frontend/src/pages/QuizPage.tsx: Displays quizzes, handles creation permissions, and supports deleting quizzes with confirmation dialogs.
frontend/src/pages/TakeQuizPage.tsx: Loads a quiz, generates word-guess or multiple-choice questions, tracks answers, and manages quiz progression and results.
frontend/src/pages/ViewLessonPage.tsx: Fetches and displays a lesson with rendered HTML content, new words, and ayahs, with loading and not-found states.
frontend/src/pages/VocabularyPage.tsx: Shows all vocabulary across lessons with sorting, details, and admin-only deletion of words.
frontend/src/pages/WhiteboardPage.tsx: Displays the active lesson with editable content, notes, and words, allowing teachers to update lesson material.
frontend/src/utils/lessonContentHtml.ts: Utility to detect HTML content and safely render or escape lesson text with newline conversion.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading URL parameters (including hash routing), persisting them in sessionStorage, and clearing them from storage or the URL hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, container settings, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata and requirements for adding rich‑text HTML editing and rendering for lesson content within the existing system.
